products.name: Tissot
products.description: Made with care and genuine leather. It is mechanically powered and holds up to 80 hours of energy.

products.name: G-Shock
products.description: Great watch for outdoor activity, but still classy enough to integrate with your nice outfits. Made with resin band and is 100 meters water resistant.

products.name: Citizen
products.description: Absolutely stunning in black. Stainless steel band with diamond accents inside the face.

products.name: Gucci
products.description: Sleek and stylish. Runs on Ronda quartz movement with a leather strap.

products.name: Movado
products.description: Flashy, but shows class and elegance. Uses Swiss quartz movement and glass is made from sapphire.

products.name: Daniel Wellington
products.description: Black and simple design. Utilizes Japanese quartz movement along with a leather band.

products.name: Holzkern
products.description: This vibrant and beautiful wooden watch is unique. Made of teak wood and stainless blue steel.

products.name: Bulova
products.description: Classic Bulova watch. Gold stainless steel band with swarovski crystals around the face.

products.name: MVMT
products.description: Glass case made of hardened mineral crystal for enhanced durability.

products.name: Seiko
products.description: Made with rose gold plating. Chronograph and uses japanese quartz movement.

products.name: Tag Heuer
products.description: Stay classy with this Tag Heuer. Uses Swiss quartz movement and dial is made of sapphire.

products.name: Rolex
products.description: One of Conor McGregor's favorites. Classic stainless steel 18k gold. Uses automatic movement.
